attributes.description:
This is a 2013 Isuzu KB300d-Teq Double Cab LX Auto. It’s built for work whether you are on the road busy with deliveries or on site, this is a good companion no matter the weather. This incredible deal is not to miss. It comes with power steering, electric windows, central locking remote, trim leather seats,  electric mirrors, radio/CD player, air conditioning and extras includes side steps, tow bar and roll bar. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
The vehicle is being reduced from 219 995 to 209995.
#9968
